original:
Can't Help Myself" is a kinetic sculpture created in 2016, commissioned by the Robert H.N. Ho family collection for display at the Solomon R. Guggenheim Museum in New York City. The artwork was featured in the exhibition "Tales of Our Time," which aimed to highlight Chinese artists and explore cultural and historical narratives that are often overlooked.

The title of the exhibition references "Gushi xin bian," a book by the modern Chin
sampled:
Can't Help Myself" is a kinetic sculpture created in 2016, commissioned from the Robert H.N. Ho family collection for display at the Solomon R. Guggenheim Museum in New Gotham Center. The artwork was featured in the exhibition "Tales in Our Time," which aimed to highlight Chinese artists and explore cultural and historical narratives that are often overlooked.

The title of this exhibition references "Gushi xin bian," a book by the modern Chin
